text: 🚨 Energy Alert! 🚨Europe, get ready for a possible energy price hike this winter! 💸🔥 Russia's gas contract with Ukraine ends this year, and a cold winter could mean a "worst case" scenario for countries reliant on Ukrainian transit. 🏔️🚨 The EU has been trying to cut back on Russian gas since the Ukraine invasion in 2022. But, Brussels, let's not forget that energy security is key! 🔒💡 What are your plans to ensure a stable energy supply for winter 2024-2025? 🤔
